title: I’ll Teach You With Passion!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>....and that’s why I’d like to ask you, Dia.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>You want to get a perfect score on the next test to impress Eli-san and Nozomi-san, huh? Regardless of the reason, I’d be more than happy to help.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Alright~! Then, I’ll be counting on you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>May I ask one thing, though? What made you ask me? Kanata-san and Emma-san should also be good candidates....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well yeah, but Shizuku told me that you’re really good at teaching. She said you explain things with a passion.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Shizuku-san told you that....? Okay! Leave it to me!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You’re too strict! Way more than Eli! Darn you, Shizuku~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>It’s not like you to give up so easily, Nico-san. Shizuku-san had the spirit to keep on going until the very end despite repeatedly taking balls to the face. Come on, show me yours, Nico-san!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Uuugh.... Alright, I get it~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
